name: Phyla 0x1
description:
This piece is a visualization of the song "Flim" by Aphex Twin (one of my all time favorite tracks). It is the second in a series of eight works. It was created using an audio visualization software that I'm developing called Phyla. To learn more about my work, follow along at sonicfauna.com.

2048x2048

Sale of work in this series will begin once all eight pieces are minted.
